tpk::Clock

tpk::Clock Class Reference

#include <Clock.h>

Inheritance diagram for tpk::Clock:

[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Pure virtual base class for clocks.

Clock is an abstract base class that defines the interface to the real-time clock.

Public Member Functions

virtual double read ()=0 throw (std::runtime_error)
 Returns the current TAI as a Modified Julian Date.
